roughclustering

Class Orthopartition

  • java.lang.Object
    • roughclustering.Orthopartition

  • public class Orthopartition
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements an orthopartition Note that all constructors may fail, and throw an exception, if the orthopartition is set to have no overlaps or if the orthopairs are not defined on the same universe
    Author:
    Andrea Campagner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Orthopartition(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> list, weka.core.Instances data)
      Construct an orthopartition given a universe a list of lists representation of the orthopartition
      Orthopartition(java.util.ArrayList<Orthopair> family)
      Construct an orthopartition from a collection of orthopairs, automatically compute whether the orthopartition should admit overlaps.
      Orthopartition(java.util.ArrayList<Orthopair> family, boolean overlap)
      Construct an orthopartition from a collection of orthopairs and whether the orthopartition should admit overlaps
      Orthopartition(int[] list, weka.core.Instances data)
      Construct an orthopartition from a list and a universe

      • Orthopartition

        public Orthopartition(java.util.ArrayList<Orthopair> family,
                      boolean overlap)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Construct an orthopartition from a collection of orthopairs and whether the orthopartition should admit overlaps
        Parameters:
        family, - a collection of orthopairs
        overlap, - whether the orthopartition admits overlaps (i.e. is an orthocovering)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - the orthopairs are defined on different universes OR orthopairs overlap (and overlap not admitted)

      • Orthopartition

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
